name: Strom AI
long_description: Strom AI is an AI-powered proposals creation platform for businesses, agencies, and freelancers. We help you create professional documents like proposals, quotes, and user requirement documents effortlessly, saving you hours of manual work. With a passion for automation, we’ve built the ultimate tool to simplify collaboration, streamline workflows, and let you focus on what truly matters—delivering exceptional results and winning clients.
one_liner: Create professional proposals, quotes, and documents in seconds.
